articles.content:
Kimjongilia Show opens 
    Samjiyon, June 18 (KCNA) -- A Ryanggang Provincial Kimjongilia Show was opened in the area of the secret camp of Mt. Paektu, a sacred place of revolution, on June 17 on the occasion of the 39th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
 Exhibited are over 2,200 Kimjongilias cultivated by officials and working people of the province and overseas compatriots with sincerity.    
 Visiting the show were Kim Kyong Ho, chief secretary of the Ryanggang Provincial Committee of the WPK, officials of the provincial party and power organs and working people's organizations, working people, youth and students, members of volunteer teams of party information workers from across the country, overseas compatriots and a large number of people on study tour of revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu.
